body:
Test output after these changes.  The slow legacy multisig tests are placed at the end.

```rake
$ test/functional/rpc_rawtransaction.py 
2021-07-13T13:42:55.022000Z TestFramework (INFO): Initializing test directory /tmp/bitcoin_func_test_u_56kycw
2021-07-13T13:42:56.672000Z TestFramework (INFO): Prepare some coins for multiple *rawtransaction commands
2021-07-13T13:43:04.132000Z TestFramework (INFO): Test getrawtransaction with -txindex, without -blocksonly
2021-07-13T13:43:04.305000Z TestFramework (INFO): Test getrawtransaction without -txindex, without -blocksonly
2021-07-13T13:43:04.447000Z TestFramework (INFO): Test getrawtransaction without -txindex, with -blocksonly
2021-07-13T13:43:04.603000Z TestFramework (INFO): Test getrawtransaction with -txindex, with -blocksonly
2021-07-13T13:43:04.763000Z TestFramework (INFO): Test getrawtransaction on genesis block coinbase returns an error
2021-07-13T13:43:04.770000Z TestFramework (INFO): Test createrawtransaction
2021-07-13T13:43:04.917000Z TestFramework (INFO): Test sendrawtransaction with missing input
2021-07-13T13:43:04.969000Z TestFramework (INFO): Test sendrawtransaction with missing prevtx info (bech32)
2021-07-13T13:43:05.055000Z TestFramework (INFO): Test sendrawtransaction with missing prevtx info (p2sh-segwit)
2021-07-13T13:43:05.121000Z TestFramework (INFO): Test sendrawtransaction with missing prevtx info (legacy)
2021-07-13T13:43:05.165000Z TestFramework (INFO): Test sendrawtransaction/testmempoolaccept with maxfeerate
2021-07-13T13:43:07.578000Z TestFramework (INFO): Test decoderawtransaction
2021-07-13T13:43:07.598000Z TestFramework (INFO): Test transaction version numbers
2021-07-13T13:43:07.602000Z TestFramework (INFO): Test raw multisig transactions (legacy)
2021-07-13T13:43:13.866000Z TestFramework (INFO): Stopping nodes
2021-07-13T13:43:14.133000Z TestFramework (INFO): Cleaning up /tmp/bitcoin_func_test_u_56kycw on exit
2021-07-13T13:43:14.134000Z TestFramework (INFO): Tests successful
```
